channel.title: So I've Noticed a Couple Things in "Old School RuneScape"
channel.description:
I've been playing the 2007 version of RuneScape thanks to the wonderful man The Elve Age, and while it's truly amazing and I can't be more grateful for it, some things just don't seem right. I've got a very keen eye when it comes to small details, so I'll list them out. Note that I'm not hating on the game; they're just things I've noticed and got me thinking.
-With many closed doors and gates (I think all in tutorial island), you literally just walk through them. I don't know if this is because of the mass amount of players and it gets disabled automatically or what -In the Draynor bank robbery cut scene, the wise old man shoots initially through an open door. Again, I'm not sure if it was like this originally. Just something that caught my eye -When you get teleported to the essence mines, you often get teleported to the upper left corner vs in the middle each time -Users sometimes appear twice in the clan chat list -When you use a bank booth, if you're on the side of it, you just turn to the bank booth instead of walking to the front and facing the banker -Back to the doors - when you walk open one, you may or may not just stop when you reach it and have to click again -Also, more of a question, but isn't a message supposed to display when a friend logs in/out?
Again, I'm not hating on the game or accusing Jagex of anything. These are just some things I found odd, especially if they used a full working backup.
[size=2pt]Secretly I think it's quite clear they stole the leaked Project RS06 source and converted it to a 468 or whatever the revision is. Hmph.[/size]
~Lin

item.title: So I've Noticed a Couple Things in "Old School RuneScape"
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:26, topic:493411”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=611643.msg4240981#msg4240981 date=1361827853]
I don’t know how you could remember so many things about it, but I highly doubt they would use someone else’s source code.
[/quote]It came from developing Rarity to be as accurate as RuneScape in terms of interacting with objects and everything else. The source code part was a joke.[/quote]
I see, good job then.

Read full topic

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:13, topic:493411”][quote author=someone2 link=topic=611643.msg4236776#msg4236776 date=1361610046]

I wouldn´t be surprised if they actually just used 2006scape´s source, also considering that this happend right after 2006scape closed.

Can’t tell if this is a troll or if you are serious

No, I´m serious. They just put up some old backup they found which they still have to work on. So if it has bugs, it must be stolen.
[/quote]
As if 2006scape could support this many players[/quote]as if 06scape had this much content
